explanation: [0-0] An olive-green mountain bike is parked on a black floor. Next to it is a cabinet with some tools on it. Behind it is a wooden wall.

[0-10] Then the camera zooms in, and a person turns the pedals of the bike. Then the person presses a button on the handlebar, and the flywheels of the bike start to move back and forth. Then he presses the seat adjustment lever, and the seat rises, revealing the golden rod under the seat. Then he presses the switch on the battery, and the battery indicator light flashes. Finally, he keeps pressing the gear shift button, and the battery indicator light keeps changing colors.
